page.title: 05BULL FARM
page.content: Mr.Wolliscroft is only a tenant. The farm consists of 216 acres,15 of which are for barley,the rest for grazing. He rears his cows for breeding,he has a herd of 160 cows and 100 calves,all Fresians.He grows his own fodder and buys some cow cake. He milks his cows and gets 6500 litres a year. He has 5 tractors,1 forklift truck,2 ploughs,1 mower/farrower,1 grass seeder,3 cultivators,4 silage tanks, and he hires a combine harvester. He has a barn in which he can store 1000 bales of hay.He hires 1 man full time and 2 part timers at the busier times of year.
